verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָזָ֔ה <S%H2372><s%> saw יְשַֽׁעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3470><s%> that Isaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמ֑וֹץ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> concerning Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> And it shall come to pass in the last הַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days נָכ֨וֹן <S%H3559><s%> shall be established יִֽהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> will come הַ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> [that] the mountain בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the top הֶהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains וְנִשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> and shall be exalted מִגְּבָע֑וֹת <S%H1389><s%> above the hills וְנָהֲר֥וּ <S%H5102><s%> shall flow אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> and all nations

וְֽהָלְכ֞וּ <S%H1980><s%> shall go עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> And many וְאָמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and say לְכ֣וּ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ye and let us go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> to the mountain יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּית֙ <S%H1004><s%> to the house אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְיֹרֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3384><s%> and he will teach מִדְּרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> us of his ways וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> may walk בְּאֹרְחֹתָ֑יו <S%H734><s%> in his paths כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> from מִצִּיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> for out of Zion תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth תוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> the law וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> and the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem

וְשָׁפַט֙ <S%H8199><s%> And he shall judge בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations וְהוֹכִ֖יחַ <S%H3198><s%> and shall rebuke לְעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְכִתְּת֨וּ <S%H3807><s%> and they shall beat חַרְבוֹתָ֜ם <S%H2719><s%> their swords לְאִתִּ֗ים <S%H855><s%> into plowshares וַחֲנִיתֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2595><s%> and their spears לְמַזְמֵר֔וֹת <S%H4211><s%> into pruninghooks לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and never יִשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> shall not lift up ג֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> against nation חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and never יִלְמְד֥וּ <S%H3925><s%> neither shall they learn ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> war פ
בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob לְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> walk בְּא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> in the light יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because נָטַ֗שְׁתָּה <S%H5203><s%> Therefore thou hast forsaken עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because מָלְאוּ֙ <S%H4390><s%> because they be replenished מִקֶּ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> from the east וְעֹֽנְנִ֖ים <S%H6049><s%> and [are] soothsayers כַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> like the Philistines וּבְיַלְדֵ֥י <S%H3206><s%> themselves in the children נָכְרִ֖ים <S%H5237><s%> of strangers יַשְׂפִּֽיקוּ׃ <S%H5606><s%> and they please

וַתִּמָּלֵ֤א <S%H4390><s%> also is full אַרְצוֹ֙ <S%H776><s%> Their land כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְזָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there קֵ֖צֶה <S%H7097><s%> neither [is there any] end לְאֹצְרֹתָ֑יו <S%H214><s%> of their treasures וַתִּמָּלֵ֤א <S%H4390><s%> is also full אַרְצוֹ֙ <S%H776><s%> their land סוּסִ֔ים <S%H5483><s%> of horses וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> is no קֵ֖צֶה <S%H7097><s%> neither [is there any] end לְמַרְכְּבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4818><s%> of their chariots

וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> also is full אַרְצ֖וֹ <S%H776><s%> Their land אֱלִילִ֑ים <S%H457><s%> of idols לְמַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> of their own hands יִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֔וּ <S%H7812><s%> they worship לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> have made אֶצְבְּעֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H676><s%> that which their own fingers

וַיִּשַּׁ֥ח <S%H7817><s%> boweth down אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> And the mean man וַיִּשְׁפַּל־ <S%H8213><s%> humbleth אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the great man וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> himself therefore forgive לָהֶֽם׃

בּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> Enter בַצּ֔וּר <S%H6697><s%> into the rock וְהִטָּמֵ֖ן <S%H2934><s%> and hide בֶּֽעָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> thee in the dust מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> for פַּ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> fear יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּמֵהֲדַ֖ר <S%H1926><s%> and for the glory גְּאֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1347><s%> of his majesty

עֵינֵ֞י <S%H5869><s%> looks גַּבְה֤וּת <S%H1365><s%> The lofty אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man שָׁפֵ֔ל <S%H8213><s%> shall be humbled וְשַׁ֖ח <S%H7817><s%> shall be bowed down ר֣וּם <S%H7312><s%> and the haughtiness אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> of man וְנִשְׂגַּ֧ב <S%H7682><s%> alone shall be exalted יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לְבַדּ֖וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for י֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For the day לַיהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> Against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone גֵּאֶ֖ה <S%H1343><s%> [shall be] upon every [one that is] proud וָרָ֑ם <S%H7311><s%> and lofty וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone נִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and upon every [one that is] lifted up וְשָׁפֵֽל׃ <S%H8213><s%> and he shall be brought low

וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַרְזֵ֣י <S%H730><s%> And upon all the cedars הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon הָרָמִ֖ים <S%H7311><s%> [that are] high וְהַנִּשָּׂאִ֑ים <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַלּוֹנֵ֥י <S%H437><s%> and upon all the oaks הַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan

וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> mountains הָרָמִ֑ים <S%H7311><s%> And upon all the high וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגְּבָע֥וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and upon all the hills הַנִּשָּׂאֽוֹת׃ <S%H5375><s%> [that are] lifted up

וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מִגְדָּ֣ל <S%H4026><s%> tower גָּבֹ֑הַ <S%H1364><s%> And upon every high וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חוֹמָ֥ה <S%H2346><s%> wall בְצוּרָֽה׃ <S%H1219><s%> and upon every fenced

וְשַׁח֙ <S%H7817><s%> shall be bowed down גַּבְה֣וּת <S%H1365><s%> And the loftiness הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְשָׁפֵ֖ל <S%H8213><s%> shall be made low ר֣וּם <S%H7312><s%> and the haughtiness אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> of men וְנִשְׂגַּ֧ב <S%H7682><s%> alone shall be exalted יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לְבַדּ֖וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he
וְהָאֱלִילִ֖ים <S%H457><s%> And the idols כָּלִ֥יל <S%H3632><s%> he shall utterly יַחֲלֹֽף׃ <S%H2498><s%> abolish

וּבָ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> And they shall go בִּמְעָר֣וֹת <S%H4631><s%> into the holes צֻרִ֔ים <S%H6697><s%> of the rocks וּבִמְחִלּ֖וֹת <S%H4247><s%> and into the caves עָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> of the earth מִפְּנֵ֞י <S%H6440><s%> for פַּ֤חַד <S%H6343><s%> fear יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּמֵהֲדַ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> and for the glory גְּאוֹנ֔וֹ <S%H1347><s%> of his majesty בְּקוּמ֖וֹ <S%H6965><s%> when he ariseth לַעֲרֹ֥ץ <S%H6206><s%> to shake terribly הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> shall cast הָאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> a man אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֱלִילֵ֣י <S%H457><s%> his idols כַסְפּ֔וֹ <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֱלִילֵ֣י <S%H457><s%> and his idols זְהָב֑וֹ <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Which עָֽשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> which they made [each one] for himself לוֹ֙ לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֔ת <S%H7812><s%> to worship לַחְפֹּ֥ר <S%H2661><s%> mole פֵּר֖וֹת <S%H2661><s%> mole וְלָעֲטַלֵּפִֽים׃ <S%H5847><s%> and to the bats
